author: dan131riley
body:
#### PR description:

While making MTV plots comparing multiple scenarios, hit a problem with floating point array indices.  This PR provides a minimal fix which allows plotting to proceed.  There are probably more cases like this, I did not audit the code for other examples.

#### PR validation:

Prior to this PR, `makeTrackValidationPlots.py --extended` of multiple DQM outputs to compare would fail with an error about floating point array indices.  With this PR, the same command succeeds.
title: minimal Validation/RecoTrack/python/plotting/plotting.py fix for division changes in py3
